Ingredients.2: 1 cup pineapple and orange juice blend

Directions.1: Place yams into a large pot and cover with salted water. Bring to a boil, then reduce heat to medium-low, cover, and simmer until tender, about 20 minutes. Drain and allow to steam dry for a minute or two.

Directions.2: Preheat oven to 325 degrees F (165 degrees C).

Directions.3: Return yams to the cooking pot, and mash with juice until smooth. Pack mashed yams into a 3 quart casserole dish, dot with butter, then sprinkle with brown sugar and nuts. Loosely cover with aluminum foil.

Directions.4: Bake in preheated oven until hot and bubbly, 35 to 40 minutes.
